testcase.name: testCompletion
testcase.system-out:
completion: There are a few ways to say this depending on the level of formality:
* **Formal/Standard:** Bonjour, comment allez-vous ? * **Informal:** Salut, ça va ? * **Neutral:** Bonjour, comment ça va ?

testcase.name: testSummarization
testcase.system-out:
prompt0: Summarize the following text: \"{input_text}\" Output:
prompt: Summarize the following text: \"Jupiter is the fifth planet from the Sun and the largest in the Solar System. It is a gas giant with a mass one-thousandth that of the Sun, but two-and-a-half times that of all the other planets in the Solar System combined. Jupiter is one of the brightest objects visible to the naked eye in the night sky, and has been known to ancient civilizations since before recorded history. It is named after the Roman god Jupiter.[19] When viewed from Earth, Jupiter can be bright enough for its reflected light to cast visible shadows,[ and is on average the third-brightest natural object in the night sky after the Moon and Venus.\" Output:
summarization completion: Jupiter is the fifth planet from the Sun and the largest in the Solar System. A massive gas giant known since ancient times, it is named after the Roman god and ranks as the third-brightest natural object in the night sky.

testcase.name: testTwoShotTemplate
testCompletionWithSearch
testcase.system-out:

* **Alphabet Inc. Class A (GOOGL):** Approximately **$313.47** * *Note:* Some sources report a closing price of $313.51, representing a slight daily decrease of about 0.18%. * **Alphabet Inc. Class C (GOOG):** Approximately **$314.96** * *Note:* This represents a daily decrease of approximately 0.22%.
### Summary Data (as of Dec 26, 2025): | Metric | GOOGL (Class A) | GOOG (Class C) | | :--- | :--- | :--- | | **Last Close** | $313.47 - $313.51 | $314.96 | | **Daily Change** | -0.18% | -0.22% | | **52-Week High** | ~$328.83 | ~$328.67 | | **52-Week Low** | ~$140.53 | ~$142.66 |
Alphabet has seen significant growth throughout 2025, largely driven by momentum in its AI initiatives (such as Gemini 3) and strong performance in its Cloud division. The stock has outperformed many of its "Magnificent Seven" peers year-to-date.
**Note:** Because today is Saturday, these prices reflect the final trading session of the week. Markets will reopen on Monday, December 29, 2025. Stock prices are subject to change during after-hours trading and pre-market sessions.
